headline: Suze Orman: An emergency fund is the most important piece to your personal investment portfolio
summary: "If you haven't learned that after this past year of what we've been through, I don't know. You have to be on another planet," personal finance expert Suze Orman told CNBC.

headline: The U.S. PC market just had its best quarter in 10 years, Gartner says
summary: The increase reflects the strongest quarterly PC demand from consumers in five years, as consumers around the world clamor for new laptops and desktops for home entertainment and remote schooling amid the ongoing coronavirus pandemic.

headline: SoftBank's Rajeev Misra says Vision Fund 2 is backing a SPAC
summary: The trendy investment vehicle will give the Vision Fund a new way of investing in private companies and give public investors access to SoftBank's portfolio manager picks.
At least 19 analysts initiated coverage of Snowflake on Monday, with price targets ranging from $214 to $350.
headline: Snowflake draws bullish calls from Wall Street, though some analysts say stock is fully valued

summary: See which stocks are posting big moves after the bell on October 12.
Disney is restructuring its media and entertainment divisions, as streaming becomes the most important facet of the company's business.
headline: Disney says its ‘primary focus’ for entertainment is streaming — announces a major reorg
Here's what happened to the stock market on Monday
summary: Tech shares rallied on Monday to lead the broader market higher.
Apple is expected on Tuesday to reveal its first major exterior redesign since 2017, when Apple released the iPhone X with facial recognition.
headline: Apple notches biggest gain since July on anticipation of next iPhone
European fintech giant Revolut is close to applying for a bank charter in California, sources say
summary: The move from Revolut, valued at $5.5 billion in a February fundraising round, is the latest example of one of a new breed of digital challengers seeking to become a regulated bank.

headline: Retailers hope Amazon's Prime Day on Tuesday kicks off early holiday shopping season
summary: Retailers are gearing up for an early start to holiday shopping by picking products to promote, using tech tools to manage their supply chain and getting employees ready.

headline: Americans might not be able to take full advantage of the 5G iPhone
summary: Speeds will be faster, but not necessarily fast enough to be a reason for upgrading until U.S. carriers finish building their networks.

headline: Best Western CEO fears for the industry's future: 'It's really bad'
summary: Travel, tourism and hospitality has been at the center of the Covid-19 crunch, hammered by a pandemic that has made many people afraid to travel and use hotels.

headline: Roblox confidentially files to go public
summary: Founded in 2004, Roblox offers users free-to-play games across mobile devices and consoles.

headline: Fed Has 'Moral Imperative' to Help the Economy More

summary: One of Warren Buffett's top lieutenants buys into Dillard's. Twitter gets a boost from an analyst upgrade.
headline: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Dillard's, Twilio, Ford Motor, Apple & more
Southwest is expanding in United hubs in Houston and Chicago
summary: Southwest Airlines announced a surprise move into Houston and Chicago's largest airports, a strategy shift that would expand it's presence in United hubs.
"There are no new answers,"  Dr. Mike Ryan, executive director of the WHO's health emergencies program, said on Friday. "We know what we need to do."
headline: Watch live: World Health Organization holds a press briefing on the ongoing coronavirus outbreak

summary: Facebook announced in a blog post Monday it will ban content that "denies or distorts the Holocaust" in a reversal of its earlier stance.
headline: Facebook reverses stance on Holocaust denial, will ban it now
Divided senators open Amy Coney Barrett confirmation hearings with focus on health care: 'This is probably not about persuading each other'
summary: A sharply divided Senate Judiciary Committee opened confirmation hearings for Judge Amy Coney Barrett, President Donald Trump's Supreme Court pick.

headline: 'Get long' — Cramer sees coronavirus trends driving stocks higher no matter who wins election
summary: "There are enough trends out there, established by Covid, that just say, 'Get long. And the No. 1, of course, is the internet just plowing through," CNBC's Jim Cramer said on Monday.
